TopicTitle: [.23+] Jeb and Bill 9000, a smaller radial Jeb for the Clarke fans.

Articles.Content: The Jeb version is only designed to work if you have MJ v<2.0 installed.
Ah, that explains it. I had suspected as much. Thank you.
Write a plugin to make it kill your crews when it approaches Jool.

The Jeb version is only designed to work if you have MJ v<2.0 installed.

Yes and no. It's pretty simple to change the part to use MJ 2.0.9 just by using the config files present in the Bill and changing the name and descriptions where applicable.

The Jeb version is only designed to work if you have MJ v<2.0 installed.

That could be problematic for people, as MJ 1.x is no longer usable as of KSP 0.21.

Hopefully the creator of this project is still around and updates it to work with MJ2, although the post above mine details how to correct it yourself.

Edited August 4, 2013 by OdinYggd

Yes and no. It's pretty simple to change the part to use MJ 2.0.9 just by using the config files present in the Bill and changing the name and descriptions where applicable.

As I said, that doesn't solve the problem. There's something else to it. Seriously, the only difference I had in the two configs were the name and the flavor text and it still gave me that weird issue.

As I said, that doesn't solve the problem. There's something else to it. Seriously, the only difference I had in the two configs were the name and the flavor text and it still gave me that weird issue.

Edit: blah blah blah was by design blah blah blah. I'll update them both to work with mj2. It was by design before, but now will be a purely aesthetic choice. I'm still working in 20.2.. Last time I fired up .21, almost nothing worked for me. Other than that these units don't work unless mechjeb works. I'll take a look.

Edited August 9, 2013 by dishycourier

Thanks for the heads-up. It's OK if the only difference is appearance - BIL-9000 is the more benign, intelligent one (Binary Interface Link, perhaps?) while JEB-900 is the more rsky, dangerous one (Jury-rigged Emergency Backup, no doubt). Just for flavor of course, but you're welcome to use that if you like.

Any word on if this works for 2.1 Mechjeb in 0.22? I'ma try it out to see

EDIT: I had to mess with the config files and set a technology level for it to get it to work, but I got it work

Before I changed anything I got this really weird bug where any text in the game from the second half of the alphabet was invisible

Any way for Bill 9000 or Jeb 9000 to work in .23?

They are both updated now. Sorry it took so long! I've been using them for play, but hadn't released it. Both now work only with MJ2

To help you choose properly, a comparison of the two:

Dave: "Open the pod bay door, Jeb."

JEB9000: "That will evacuate the pressure hull and leave everything, including you, exposed to vacuum... BUT WE'VE BEEN THROUGH WORSE!!! LET'S DO IT!!!! WOOOO!"

Dave: "Open the pod bay door, Bill"

BILL9000: "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!"
